arts.ttl: Man City 3-0 Man United: Post-match Man United player ratings
arts.sum: Similar to Yoro, the centre back's passing was a positive aspect of his game today as he looked to push his side on from the back. United's skipper showed no indication of his best self today and ultimately was a burden to the team at times, especially with his passing.

arts.ttl: Amorim agony, Guardiola glee: Five key talking points from Manchester derby
arts.sum: Following Man City's 3-0 triumph over rivals Man United in the Premier League on Sunday, Sports Mole takes a closer look at five key talking points from the 197th Manchester derby.

arts.ttl: How Man City punished new and familiar Man Utd flaws
arts.sum: Haaland’s ruthless double was clear evidence of that, as was the ease with which Jeremy Doku danced through the Man Utd defence, assisting the first two goals, and as was a mercurial midfield display from Phil Foden . He has been directly involved in 11 goals in six Premier League appearances for City against United (eight goals and three assists) and, incredibly, 15 of the last 17 goals scored by Man City in the Manchester derby have been netted by Foden (seven) or Haaland (eight).

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim makes Man United sack admission after Manchester City defeat
arts.sum: Manchester United were beaten 3-0 by Manchester City in the first derby of the season to leave them with just four points from their opening four Premier League games

arts.ttl: Theo Walcott says Pep Guardiola's 'incredible' Man City transfer decision paid off vs Man United
arts.sum: Manchester City secured a second win of the Premier League season as they defeated Manchester United 3-0 in the derby. Erling Haaland’s brace and Phil...

arts.ttl: Four things we learnt from Man United’s 3-0 defeat to Man City
arts.sum: There were brief glimpses of attacking promise, but United once again lacked the quality, ruthlessness, and defensive resilience needed to compete with Pep Guardiola’s side. If United are serious about building for the future, they need to give Amad more opportunities in attacking roles — his technical ability and composure could be vital in unlocking tight defenses.

arts.ttl: Gary Neville gives Ruben Amorim Man United sack timeline as pressure grows after Man City defeat
arts.sum: Manchester United legend Gary Neville has delivered a damning verdict on his former club after their abysmal defeat at Man City on Sunday continued their poor start to the season

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim sack verdict given after Man United defeat to Manchester City - 'not working'
arts.sum: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim continues to oversee poor results with just one win so far this season after finishing 15th in the Premier League last term

arts.ttl: Man City and Man United fans unite to pay tribute to boxing icon Hatton
arts.sum: Fans of Manchester City and Manchester United paid tribute to Ricky Hatton on Sunday after news of the death of the former boxing world champion . Hatton, from Greater Manchester, was a British sporting icon and lifelong fan of City.

arts.ttl: Three Takeaways from Man Utd’s Convincing Derby Day Defeat to Man City
arts.sum: The Red Devils failed to claim bragging rights in Sunday’s Manchester Derby.
